metadata.description: Long-term investment strategy with sub-algorithm variants for iterative testing
metadata.author: Algorithm Discovery System

current_algorithm.name: Advanced Multi-Factor Long-Term
current_algorithm.description: Advanced algorithm combining best sub-algorithm variants for long-term investing

v1.0.name: Basic Fundamental Filter
v1.0.description: Simple P/E and ROE based filtering
v1.0.query: ( {cash} ( latest close > latest sma ( latest close , 20 ) and latest sma ( latest close , 20 ) > latest sma ( latest close , 50 ) and latest volume > latest sma ( latest volume , 20 ) * 1.2 and latest close > latest ema ( latest close , 21 ) and ( latest close - 1 week ago close ) / 1 week ago close * 100 > 1 and market cap > 500 and latest sma ( latest close * latest volume , 20 ) > 100000 and quarterly sum ( quarterly net profit/reported profit after tax , 4 ) > 0 and yearly return on capital employed percentage > 12 and yearly debt equity ratio < 1.5 ) )

v1.1.name: Enhanced Fundamental Quality
v1.1.description: Improved fundamental metrics with quality checks
v1.1.query: ( {cash} ( yearly cash and cash equivalents at beginning of the year > 0 and market cap > 800 and market cap / quarterly sum ( quarterly net profit/reported profit after tax , 4 ) < 16 and market cap / quarterly sum ( quarterly net profit/reported profit after tax , 4 ) > 5 and quarterly sum ( quarterly net profit/reported profit after tax , 4 ) > 30 and yearly return on capital employed percentage > 12 and yearly debt equity ratio < 1.0 ) )

v2.0.name: Advanced Fundamental Screening
v2.0.description: Comprehensive fundamental analysis with multiple ratios
v2.0.query: ( {cash} ( market cap > 1000 and market cap / quarterly sum ( quarterly net profit/reported profit after tax , 4 ) < 16 and market cap / quarterly sum ( quarterly net profit/reported profit after tax , 4 ) > 8 and yearly return on net worth percentage > 20 and yearly debt equity ratio < 0.3 and yearly current ratio > 1.5 and yearly interest cover > 5 ) )

v1.0.name: Basic Price Momentum
v1.0.description: Simple moving average and volume momentum
v1.0.query: ( {cash} ( latest close > latest sma(close,20) and latest close > latest sma(close,50) and latest volume > latest sma(volume,20) * 1.2 ) )

v1.1.name: Enhanced Volume Momentum
v1.1.description: Price momentum with strong volume confirmation
v1.1.query: ( {cash} ( latest close > latest sma ( latest close , 20 ) and latest sma ( latest close , 20 ) > latest sma ( latest close , 50 ) and latest volume > latest sma ( latest volume , 20 ) * 1.5 and latest close > 1 week ago close ) )

v2.0.name: Multi-Timeframe Momentum
v2.0.description: Momentum across multiple timeframes with breakout detection
v2.0.query: ( {cash} ( latest close > latest sma ( latest close , 20 ) and latest sma ( latest close , 20 ) > latest sma ( latest close , 50 ) and latest volume > latest sma ( latest volume , 20 ) * 1.3 and latest close > latest ema ( latest close , 21 ) and latest close - 1 week ago close / 1 week ago close * 100 > 2 ) )

v1.0.name: Traditional Value Metrics
v1.0.query: ( {cash} ( market cap / quarterly sum ( quarterly net profit/reported profit after tax , 4 ) < 15 and yearly book value / latest close < 2 and yearly dividend per share rupees / latest close * 100 > 1 and market cap > 1000 ) )

v1.1.name: Modern Value with Quality
v1.1.query: ( {cash} ( yearly debt equity ratio < 1.5 and market cap / quarterly sum ( quarterly net profit/reported profit after tax , 4 ) < 20 and yearly book value / latest close < 3 and yearly net profit/reported profit after tax / yearly book value * 100 > 10 and market cap > 800 ) )

v1.2.name: Growth at Reasonable Price
v1.2.description: GARP strategy combining growth and value
v1.2.query: ( {cash} ( market cap / quarterly sum ( quarterly net profit/reported profit after tax , 4 ) < 18 and yearly net profit/reported profit after tax / yearly book value * 100 > 20 and yearly debt equity ratio < 0.5 and latest close > latest sma ( latest close , 100 ) and market cap > 1000 and yearly net profit/reported profit after tax - 1 year ago net profit/reported profit after tax / 1 year ago net profit/reported profit after tax * 100 > 10 ) )

v1.0.name: Basic Quality Metrics
v1.0.query: ( {cash} ( yearly debt equity ratio < 1 and yearly current ratio > 1 and market cap > 1000 and yearly net profit/reported profit after tax / yearly book value * 100 > 15 ) )

v1.1.name: Enhanced Quality Assessment
v1.1.query: ( {cash} ( yearly net profit/reported profit after tax / yearly book value * 100 > 20 and yearly return on capital employed percentage > 18 and yearly debt equity ratio < 0.5 and yearly current ratio > 1.5 and yearly interest cover > 5 and market cap > 500 ) )

v1.2.name: Dividend Quality Focus
v1.2.query: ( {cash} ( yearly net profit/reported profit after tax / yearly book value * 100 > 15 and yearly debt equity ratio < 1 and yearly interest cover > 5 and market cap > 3000 and yearly dividend per share rupees / latest close * 100 > 0.5 ) )

v1.0.0.name: Basic Long-Term Growth
v1.0.0.description: Initial long-term algorithm focusing on fundamental growth

v1.1.0.name: Enhanced Long-Term Quality
v1.1.0.description: Enhanced algorithm with improved quality filters

v2.0.0.name: Advanced Multi-Factor
v2.0.0.description: Advanced algorithm combining best variants with momentum focus

v2.1.0.name: Experimental High-Performance Long-Term
v2.1.0.description: Experimental version with latest sub-algorithm variants for long-term investing

value_momentum.query: ( {cash} ( latest "market cap" > 1000 and latest "p/e" < 16 and latest "p/e" > 8 and latest "return on equity" > 20 and latest "debt to equity" < 0.3 and latest close > latest sma(close,50) and latest volume > latest sma(volume,20) * 1.3 and latest "current ratio" > 1.5 ) )
value_momentum.description: Value stocks with momentum and quality metrics - derived from fundamental v2.0

growth_quality.query: ( {cash} ( latest "market cap" > 800 and latest "return on equity" > 18 and latest "return on capital employed" > 15 and latest "p/e" < 22 and latest "debt to equity" < 0.8 and latest close > latest sma(close,20) and latest sma(close,20) > latest sma(close,50) and latest volume > 40000 ) )
growth_quality.description: High-quality growth stocks with strong fundamentals - derived from quality v1.1 + momentum v2.0

dividend_aristocrats.query: ( {cash} ( latest "market cap" > 3000 and latest "dividend yield" > 0.5 and latest "p/e" < 20 and latest "return on equity" > 15 and latest "debt to equity" < 1 and latest "interest coverage" > 5 and latest close > 200 ) )
dividend_aristocrats.description: High-quality dividend stocks - derived from quality v1.2 + value v1.2

fallback_queries: ( {cash} ( market cap > 500 and latest close > 50 and latest volume > 10000 ) )
( {cash} ( latest close > latest sma(close,50) and latest volume > 20000 ) )
